item.title: 3/6 Disco Donny Dynamite’s “From the Record Store to the Dance Floor!”
item.dc:creator: BenmeR
item.description: BenmeR presents: Disco Donny Dynamite’s “From the Record Store to the Dance Floor!” A curated playlist of the many albums he bought that immediately made him have to see those artists live in concert. Tune in, drink along, and chat with the host and other attendees!
item.content:encoded:
BenmeR presents: Disco Donny Dynamite’s “From the Record Store to the Dance Floor!”
A curated playlist of the many albums he bought that immediately made him have to see those artists live in concert.

Tune in, drink along, and chat with the host and other attendees!

item.title: Live from Lakes of Fire – The Great Lakes Regional Burn
item.dc:creator: sfeditor
item.description: 𝐁𝐑𝐎𝐀𝐃𝐂𝐀𝐒𝐓 𝐀𝐋𝐄𝐑𝐓 – 𝐋𝐢𝐯𝐞 𝟐𝟒/𝟕 𝐟𝐫𝐨𝐦 𝐋𝐚𝐤𝐞𝐬 𝐨𝐟 𝐅𝐢𝐫𝐞, 𝐓𝐡𝐞 𝐆𝐫𝐞𝐚𝐭 𝐋𝐚𝐤𝐞𝐬 𝐑𝐞𝐠𝐢𝐨𝐧𝐚𝐥 𝐁𝐮𝐫𝐧. 𝑆𝑡𝑎𝑟𝑡𝑖𝑛𝑔 𝑜𝑛 𝑊𝑒𝑑𝑛𝑒𝑠𝑑𝑎𝑦, 𝐽𝑢𝑙𝑦 17𝑡ℎ 𝑎𝑡 9:00𝑎𝑚 𝑃𝑇 𝑎𝑛𝑑 𝑟𝑢𝑛𝑛𝑖𝑛𝑔 24/7 𝑡𝑖𝑙𝑙 𝑆𝑢𝑛𝑑𝑎𝑦 𝐽𝑢𝑙𝑦 21𝑠𝑡 𝑎𝑡 9𝑎𝑚 𝑃𝑇 𝑤𝑒 𝑎𝑟𝑒 𝑝𝑙𝑒𝑎𝑠𝑒𝑑 𝑡𝑜 𝑏𝑟𝑖𝑛𝑔 𝑦𝑜𝑢 𝑎 𝑙𝑖𝑣𝑒 𝑏𝑟𝑜𝑎𝑑𝑐𝑎𝑠𝑡 𝑓𝑟𝑜𝑚 𝐿𝑎𝑘𝑒𝑠 𝑜𝑓 𝐹𝑖𝑟𝑒 𝑣𝑖𝑎 𝑡ℎ𝑒 𝑐𝑟𝑒𝑤 𝑎𝑡 𝑅𝑎𝑑𝑖𝑜 𝑆𝐺𝐶. 𝑇ℎ𝑖𝑠 𝑝𝑟𝑜𝑚𝑖𝑠𝑒𝑠 𝑡𝑜 𝑏𝑒 […]
item.content:encoded:
𝐁𝐑𝐎𝐀𝐃𝐂𝐀𝐒𝐓 𝐀𝐋𝐄𝐑𝐓 – 𝐋𝐢𝐯𝐞 𝟐𝟒/𝟕 𝐟𝐫𝐨𝐦 𝐋𝐚𝐤𝐞𝐬 𝐨𝐟 𝐅𝐢𝐫𝐞, 𝐓𝐡𝐞 𝐆𝐫𝐞𝐚𝐭 𝐋𝐚𝐤𝐞𝐬 𝐑𝐞𝐠𝐢𝐨𝐧𝐚𝐥 𝐁𝐮𝐫𝐧.

𝑆𝑡𝑎𝑟𝑡𝑖𝑛𝑔 𝑜𝑛 𝑊𝑒𝑑𝑛𝑒𝑠𝑑𝑎𝑦, 𝐽𝑢𝑙𝑦 17𝑡ℎ 𝑎𝑡 9:00𝑎𝑚 𝑃𝑇 𝑎𝑛𝑑 𝑟𝑢𝑛𝑛𝑖𝑛𝑔 24/7 𝑡𝑖𝑙𝑙 𝑆𝑢𝑛𝑑𝑎𝑦 𝐽𝑢𝑙𝑦 21𝑠𝑡 𝑎𝑡 9𝑎𝑚 𝑃𝑇 𝑤𝑒 𝑎𝑟𝑒 𝑝𝑙𝑒𝑎𝑠𝑒𝑑 𝑡𝑜 𝑏𝑟𝑖𝑛𝑔 𝑦𝑜𝑢 𝑎 𝑙𝑖𝑣𝑒 𝑏𝑟𝑜𝑎𝑑𝑐𝑎𝑠𝑡 𝑓𝑟𝑜𝑚 𝐿𝑎𝑘𝑒𝑠 𝑜𝑓 𝐹𝑖𝑟𝑒 𝑣𝑖𝑎 𝑡ℎ𝑒 𝑐𝑟𝑒𝑤 𝑎𝑡 𝑅𝑎𝑑𝑖𝑜 𝑆𝐺𝐶. 𝑇ℎ𝑖𝑠 𝑝𝑟𝑜𝑚𝑖𝑠𝑒𝑠 𝑡𝑜 𝑏𝑒 𝑎𝑛 𝑎𝑚𝑎𝑧𝑖𝑛𝑔 𝑏𝑟𝑜𝑎𝑑𝑐𝑎𝑠𝑡. 𝑇ℎ𝑒 𝑡ℎ𝑒𝑚𝑒 𝑡ℎ𝑖𝑠 𝑦𝑒𝑎𝑟 𝑎𝑡 𝐿𝑎𝑘𝑒𝑠 𝑜𝑓 𝐹𝑖𝑟𝑒 𝑖𝑠 𝐼𝑚𝑎𝑔𝑖𝑛𝑎𝑟𝑖𝑢𝑚 𝐴𝑞𝑢𝑎𝑟𝑖𝑢𝑚. 𝐼𝑡’𝑠 𝑡𝑖𝑚𝑒 𝑡𝑜 𝐵𝑢𝑟𝑛. 𝑇𝑢𝑛𝑒 𝑖𝑛!

The broadcast runs 24/7 so no matter what time zone you live in, there will be amazing Burner radio for you when you tune in.

You can also interact with them live at https://shoutingfire.com/chat

View or download the Radio SGC 2024 Lakes of Fire broadcast schedule here : bit.ly/3S6h0p6

𝐓𝐮𝐧𝐞 𝐢𝐧 𝐚𝐭 𝐒𝐡𝐨𝐮𝐭𝐢𝐧𝐠𝐅𝐢𝐫𝐞.𝐜𝐨𝐦 𝐨𝐫 𝐬𝐞𝐚𝐫𝐜𝐡 𝐟𝐨𝐫 𝐮𝐬 𝐨𝐧 𝐢𝐇𝐞𝐚𝐫𝐭 𝐑𝐚𝐝𝐢𝐨 𝐨𝐫 𝐓𝐮𝐧𝐞 𝐈𝐧 𝐑𝐚𝐝𝐢𝐨. 𝐖𝐞 𝐚𝐫𝐞 𝐚𝐥𝐬𝐨 𝐨𝐧 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐑𝐚𝐝𝐢𝐨 𝐆𝐚𝐫𝐝𝐞𝐧 𝐚𝐩𝐩.

item.title: Live from Burning Flipside – A Texas Regional Event
item.dc:creator: sfeditor
item.description: Burning Flipside is a Burning Man Texas regional event. It is a place for radical self-expression and an experiment in temporary community building. The theme this year is Cosmic Critter Carnival Shouting Fire is bringing you live broadcasts from the event via KFLIP-FM. There are too many broadcast times to list and you are all […]
item.content:encoded:
Burning Flipside is a Burning Man Texas regional event. It is a place for radical self-expression and an experiment in temporary community building.   The theme this year is Cosmic Critter Carnival

Shouting Fire is bringing you live broadcasts from the event via KFLIP-FM.   There are too many broadcast times to list and you are all in dirfferent time zones so check the Shouting Fire broadcast schedule for all the show times displayed in your time zone.  https://shoutingfire.com/calendar

𝐓𝐮𝐧𝐞 𝐢𝐧 𝐫𝐢𝐠𝐡𝐭 𝐡𝐞𝐫𝐞 𝐚𝐭 𝐒𝐡𝐨𝐮𝐭𝐢𝐧𝐠𝐅𝐢𝐫𝐞.𝐜𝐨𝐦 𝐨𝐫 𝐬𝐞𝐚𝐫𝐜𝐡 𝐟𝐨𝐫 𝐒𝐡𝐨𝐮𝐭𝐢𝐧𝐠𝐅𝐢𝐫𝐞 𝐨𝐧 𝐢𝐇𝐞𝐚𝐫𝐭 𝐑𝐚𝐝𝐢𝐨 𝐨𝐫 𝐓𝐮𝐧𝐞 𝐈𝐧 𝐑𝐚𝐝𝐢𝐨. 𝐖𝐞 𝐚𝐫𝐞 𝐚𝐥𝐬𝐨 𝐨𝐧 𝐭𝐡𝐞 𝐑𝐚𝐝𝐢𝐨 𝐆𝐚𝐫𝐝𝐞𝐧 𝐚𝐩𝐩.

item.title: Live from AfrikaBurn 2024!
item.dc:creator: burnbrite
item.description: We are delighted to bring you a 24/7, live broadcast from the Radio Free Tankwa crew at AfrikaBurn. Learn more here. AfrikaBurn is the spectacular result of a community of participants who come together to create art, costume, performance, gifted and volunteered services, Theme Camps, music, Mutant Vehicles, and much, much more. It is a […]
item.content:encoded:
We are delighted to bring you a 24/7, live broadcast from the Radio Free Tankwa crew at AfrikaBurn. Learn more here.

AfrikaBurn is the spectacular result of a community of participants who come together to create art, costume, performance, gifted and volunteered services, Theme Camps, music, Mutant Vehicles, and much, much more. It is a chance to invent the world anew.

The flagship AfrikaBurn event takes place in the Tankwa Karoo, at Quaggafontein Farm, located in the Western Cape Province of South Africa, around the end of April every year.

AfrikaBurn is the largest of many events across the globe that share Guiding Principles through affiliation with the Burning Man Regional Network

…https://www.afrikaburn.org/about/

item.title: Silent Night with BenmeR & Whirlwind – Thurs 12/8 @ 6pm PT
item.dc:creator: BenmeR
item.description: Silent Night with BenmeR & Whirlwind Trying to do an upbeat holiday radio show with a baby sleeping in the room next door seems to be a bit of a challenge. So instead, we bring to your earballs the Silent Night broadcast! Chill music that hopefully will not disturb the little one. (plus if you […]
item.content:encoded:
Silent Night with BenmeR & Whirlwind
Trying to do an upbeat holiday radio show with a baby sleeping in the room next door seems to be a bit of a challenge. So instead, we bring to your earballs the Silent Night broadcast! Chill music that hopefully will not disturb the little one.  (plus if you tune in early, you may get to hear the Bean!)

item.title: BenmeR & Whirlwind & An Alien Keyboard – 10/13 @ 6PM PT
item.dc:creator: BenmeR
item.description: Not sure where this keyboard came from. Which one of these buttons does what?!? Hmm… looks like we figure it out live on the air! More songs picked at random for your earballs! Tune in, raise your glass, and interact at: www.shoutingfire.com/chat

item.title: BenmeR & Friends – Burn Your Earballs! Thurs 9/1 @ 6pm PT
item.dc:creator: BenmeR
item.description: Whether you are in the desert or at home, your earballs got a special treat this Thursday night! The whole crew is gathering to broadcast some good mojo into the burn and share some special music to fuel your evening! Join the celebration & raise your dust filled glass! www.shoutingfire.com/chat
